General.Name: Par Drugs And Chemicals Limited
General.Description: Par Drugs and Chemicals Limited develops, produces, and sells active pharma ingredients and fine chemicals in India. It offers magnesium salts, dried aluminum hydroxide gel, sodium aluminum silicate, precipitated silica, magnesium silicate, colloidal silicon dioxide, sucralfate USP, and amorphous and blended products. The company also exports its products. Par Drugs and Chemicals Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Vadodara, India.
